name: XRViewer
description: This plugin template uses Typescript. If you are familiar with Javascript, Typescript will look very familiar. In fact, valid Javascript code is already valid Typescript code.

scripts.dev:all: npm-run-all -l -p dev:page_xrviewer dev:page_gltf dev:xrviewer dev:webxr dev:local_webxr dev:unity dev:local_unity dev:gltf
scripts.dev:page_gltf: webpack serve --config ./webpack/webpack.plugin.js --mode=development --env PLUGIN=gltf --env BUILD=page --env WIDTH=640 --env HEIGHT=640 --env MODE=dev
scripts.build:all: npm-run-all -l -p build:page_xrviewer build:page_gltf build:xrviewer build:webxr build:local_webxr build:unity build:local_unity build:gltf
scripts.build:page_gltf: webpack --config ./webpack/webpack.plugin.js --mode=production --env PLUGIN=gltf --env BUILD=page --env WIDTH=640 --env HEIGHT=640 --env MODE=build
scripts.zip:all: bestzip release/XRViewer.zip XRViewer/* && bestzip release/XRViewer_WebXR.zip XRViewer_WebXR/* && bestzip release/XRViewer_Local_WebXR.zip XRViewer_Local_WebXR/* && bestzip release/XRViewer_Local_Unity.zip XRViewer_Local_Unity/* && bestzip release/XRViewer_Unity.zip XRViewer_Unity/* && bestzip release/XRViewer_GLTF.zip XRViewer_GLTF/* && echo figma plugin zipped && bestzip release/mac_script.zip cli/mac_script/* && echo mac script zipped && bestzip release/win_script.zip cli/win_script/* && echo win script zipped
scripts.delete-license: rm XRViewer/ui.js.LICENSE.txt && rm XRViewer_WebXR/ui.js.LICENSE.txt && rm XRViewer_Local_WebXR/ui.js.LICENSE.txt && rm XRViewer_Local_Unity/ui.js.LICENSE.txt && rm XRViewer_Unity/ui.js.LICENSE.txt && rm XRViewer_GLTF/index.js.LICENSE.txt
scripts.clean-build: rm XRViewer/code.js && rm XRViewer/ui.html && rm XRViewer_WebXR/code.js && rm XRViewer_WebXR/ui.html && rm XRViewer_Local_WebXR/code.js && rm XRViewer_Local_WebXR/ui.html && rm XRViewer_Local_Unity/code.js && rm XRViewer_Local_Unity/ui.html && rm XRViewer_Unity/code.js && rm XRViewer_Unity/ui.html && rm XRViewer_GLTF/code.js && rm XRViewer_GLTF/index.html && rm -rf release
scripts.release: npm run clean-build && mkdir release && echo all files cleaned && npm run build:all && npm run delete-license && echo build finished && npm run zip:all && dotenv release-it --ci --github.autoGenerate
